long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the mysterious world of this game, where an abandoned toy factory holds secrets waiting to be unveiled. Delve into dark corridors, solve puzzles, and experience the perfect blend of a captivating storyline, unsettling ambiance, and innovative gameplay mechanics.

Game Controls ğŸ•¹

Master the controls to navigate the eerie toy factory:

Arrow Keys or WASD: Control character movement.
Mouse: Interact with objects, solve puzzles, and explore the environment.
How to Play ğŸ•µï¸â€â™‚ï¸

Explore the Toy Factory: Navigate through dark and atmospheric environments, uncovering the secrets of the abandoned toy factory.

Solve Puzzles: Encounter challenging puzzles that require wit and exploration to progress through the game.

Encounter Unique Characters: Interact with distinctive characters and entities within the factory, each contributing to the unfolding narrative.

Uncover the Story: Piece together the narrative by exploring documents, recordings, and the eerie surroundings.

Play other games on the top-left menu.
